Subject: Performance Issue
Description:
Hello Team,
One of our employees whose device we recently deployed EndPoint Protector on has told us about significant performance issues he is facing due to it. Please help reviewing our content aware policies and suggest ways to improve our performance issues. Thanks
What_We_Know__c: We suggested to the customer to reinstall the EPP client agent to the affected computer as this is a singular case.
Next_Steps__c: If the issue persists after the reinstall, we will provide another EPP client build to test with.
Solution_Comment__c:
We suggested to the customer to reinstall the EPP client agent to the affected computer as this is a singular case.
The customer has confirmed that the issue is no longer present.
